subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The last time that Derek Lowe, Grady Little and Nomar Garciaparra were together in the postseason, they were playing for the Red Sox in Game 7 of the 2003 A.L.C.S. at Yankee Stadium.
snippet: The last time that Derek Lowe, Grady Little and Nomar Garciaparra were together in the postseason, they were playing for the Red Sox in Game 7 of the 2003 A.L.C.S. at Yankee Stadium.
